onfirstenter.display: Welcome to Don't Be Sorry! You are a member of the plebian masses of Landia, your hometown. Yesterday you turned 16, the age of coming in your rather primal society, and chose the vocation of Adventurer. You are currently standing outside your respective elder's abode, contemplating entrance and seriously doubting yesterday's decision.

onenter.display: You stand in the village of Landia. You are in front of the elder's house in the town square.

onfirstenter.display: You enter the elder's home. He asks you for a reminder of your name.
